name: Chest of Gloves of the Obedient
description: Double-click to choose a piece of Ascended armor.

name: Impaled Prisoner Token
description: Found inside Samarog's chest. Double-click or trade in at the guild decoration trader to earn a decoration.

name: Gold Mursaat Overseer Trophy
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: White Mantle Elite Guard Mask
description: <c=@flavor>This mask is worn by elite members of Confessor Beetlestone's guard. Equipping does not guarantee acceptance in White Mantle cliques.</c>

name: Lake Doric Cache
description: Double-click to gain Dragonite Ore, Empyreal Fragments, Obsidian Shards, Mystic Clovers, Unbound Magic, Testimonies of Heroics, and the choice of headgear, headgear skins, or Jade Shards.

name: Defender's Demon Gavel
description: <c=@flavor>Such that the defense may rest.</c>

name: Recipe: Thackeray's Barbute
description: A recipe to make an ascended heavy helm with Seraph (+Condition Damage, +Precision, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.

name: Overseer's Reliquary
description: Double-click to open. Contains a choice of rewards unique to the Mursaat Overseer encounter.

name: Caudecus's Mask Box
description: Open to choose a Confessor Caudecus's Mask.

name: Fresh Seafood
description: Cooks in Saidra's Haven may be able to cook this seafood properly. This may also be used to heal soldiers around Lakeside Bazaar. A fisherman in New Loamhurst can use this to help resupply the village.

name: Thackeray's Weapon Recipe Book
description: Double-click to choose a recipe for crafting gear with the Seraph stat combination.
